text: The Catholic Bible contains the scripture that that the Catholic Church has defined. This is all 73 books as proclaimed at the Council of Rome, Council of Carthage, and council of Trent. It has all 66 books a Protestant bible will have and the full 7 Deuterocanonical books and the full Daniel and Esther. The 7 books that are found here and not in a Protestant Bible are the Book of Tobit, Book of Judith, 1 Maccabees, 2 Maccabees, Sirach, Wisdom of Solomon and Book of Baruch. Category:Bible versions
title: Catholic Bible
